byline.contributor: Reporting on the Metro-North train crash was contributed by Stephen Farrell, Lisa W. Foderaro, Winnie Hu, Thomas Kaplan, Corey Kilgannon, William K. Rashbaum, Marc Santora, Nate Schweber and John Surico, and research by Susan C. Beachy.
byline.original: By N. R. KLEINFIELD and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS

abstract: Friends and colleagues recall memories of newly identified victims in Metro-North Railroad crash near Valhalla, NY; deceased include driver Ellen Brody and commuters Eric M Vandercar, Walter Liedtke, Robert Dirks, Aditya Tomar and Joseph Nadol.
lead_paragraph: Friends and co-workers share memories of some of those who died in the accident, including the driver of the S.U.V. stuck on the tracks and three passengers on the train.

headline.main: Friends and Colleagues Remember Lives Lost in the Metro-North Crash
headline.print_headline: Friends and Work Colleagues Remembering Lives Lost in the Metro-North Crash

snippet: Friends and co-workers share memories of some of those who died in the accident, including the driver of the S.U.V. stuck on the tracks and three passengers on the train.
